xml:
Zomacton<tm tmtype="reg"/> Directions for administration

For use by subcutaneous injection.
Prescribing and dispensing information

4 mg vial for use with ZomaJet 2 Vision needle-free device (non-NHS but available free of charge from clinics) or with needles and syringes.

10 mg vial for use with ZomaJet Vision X needle-free device (non-NHS but available free of charge from clinics) or with needles and syringes.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
title: Zomacton
